remarks: Existential Instantiation.  Virtual deduction form of ~ exlimexi . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
exinst.1 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
exinst.2 $e |- (. E. x ph ,. ph ->. ps ). $.
exinst $p |- ( E. x ph -> ps ) $.
